testcase.name: Register and send mail from eLearning Site. Confirm the acknowledgement
testcase.system-out: Given User has launched the eLearning Site..................................passed When User clicks on the sign up button......................................passed Then User confirm follow courses checkbox is selected.......................passed And User enters the FirstName as "Ashu".....................................passed And User enters the LastName as "Sabnekar"..................................passed And User enters the email as "ashu@SDET.com"................................passed And User enters the username as "Ashu6".....................................passed And User enters the password as "ashu1982"..................................passed And User enters the confirm password as "ashu1982"..........................passed Then User clicks on register button.........................................passed And User Registration is successful.........................................passed Then User clicks on the Profile drop down at top right corner...............passed And User verifies the email address given as "ashu@SDET.com"................passed Then User clicks on the inbox link..........................................passed And User is redirected to Messages page.....................................passed Then User clicks on the compose message button..............................passed And User is directed to the compose email page..............................passed Then User enters the recepient email address as "ash".......................passed Then User enter the subject text as "Demo Mail".............................passed And User clicks on the Send Message button..................................passed Then User confimrs the acknowledgement......................................passed
